name: project-studio
description: Full-stack product development orchestration from idea to production-ready code. Provides specialized agents for PRD building, architecture design, UX design, and implementation planning - all optimized for AI agent execution (Ralph loop).

new-project.description: Start a new project from an idea - guides through discovery, architecture, design, and planning phases

continue-project.description: Continue an existing project - analyzes codebase and infers documentation before adding new features

phase.description: Jump to or check status of a specific phase (e.g., /phase discovery, /phase architecture)

gate-check.description: Run phase gate checklist to verify readiness for next phase

product-prd-builder.description: Specialized agent for building Product PRDs through guided discovery

feature-prd-builder.description: Specialized agent for creating Ralph-ready Feature PRDs with properly sized stories

architect.description: Technical architecture agent for technology decisions and system design

designer.description: UX/UI design agent for user flows, wireframes, and design systems

codebase-analyzer.description: Deep codebase analysis agent for existing projects

project-studio.description: Core project orchestration skill - automatically applied when building apps from ideas
